Text.Page:
Well, it'd be easier to find this "magic stone" if we knew more about it. And it probably came here on a ship, right?

Every ship in the Red Lash fleet has a logbook. And when the ships are docked, the {@LinkCreature:11#2001#Red Lash mates} and their subordinates, the {@LinkCreature:11#2005#Red Lash drillers}, carry the logbooks.

Let's abscond with the logbooks and do a little research.

Let's see... "Stone-comma-magic..." Here it is!

Came here about a year ago. It's really bigâ€”the only cargo on that voyage. And in every other column, it just says "Dementalith. See Captain."

I was hoping for more, frankly.
Those logbooks are the key. They'll tell us what sort of magic stone to look for. Get the {@LinkCreature:11#2001#Red Lash mates} and {@LinkCreature:11#2005#Red Lash drillers}.
